articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.

Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

ETH ETF sees first in flow in 10 days. Funding rates all turn negative. Mr 100 buys 500 BTC in dip. France formally charges Durov, can’t leave country. TON jumps 6% after Durov release. Russia to start using crypto for trade this week. Stablecoin TVL hits ATH of $168bn. Durov faces several serious charges in France. Telegram also under investigation in India. Amid crypto's "renaissance" period, he sees prediction markets and stablecoins as bright spots, while regulation looks inevitable for a maturing industry.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The world of meme coins continues to evolve, with projects like Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) adding exciting new functionalities to their ecosystems. While Dogecoin (DOGE) remains a household name in the cryptocurrency space, it faces stiff competition as its rivals introduce mobile gaming utilities and expand their real-world applications. In this article, we’ll explore how Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are setting the pace, offering mobile gaming and decentralized features that could give them the edge over Dogecoin (DOGE).
 
Shiba Inu and Mpeppe (MPEPE) Embrace Mobile Gaming: A Strategic Shift 
Both Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) have recognized the growing importance of mobile gaming in the cryptocurrency space. By adding mobile gaming utilities to their ecosystems, t…
articles.title: Dogecoin Rivals Shiba Inu and Mpeppe (MPEPE) Add Mobile Gaming Utility To Their Ecosystems, Here’s More

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Dogecoin (DOGE), once the poster child for meme cryptocurrencies, is now facing competition from newer, more innovative projects like Mpeppe (MPEPE). With a focus on mobile gaming and casino utility, Mpeppe (MPEPE) is quickly gaining traction, leaving some Dogecoin (DOGE) investors to reconsider their portfolios.
 
Here’s why investors are choosing Mpeppe (MPEPE) over Dogecoin (DOGE) and how Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s casino utility and mobile gaming integration are positioning it for major growth.
 
Enhanced Security and Privacy for Players 
One of the key reasons new investors are gravitating toward Mpeppe (MPEPE) is its focus on enhanced security and privacy for users. Unlike traditional gaming and gambling platforms, which may expose players to data breaches and privacy concerns, Mpeppe (MPEPE) …
articles.title: Dogecoin: New Investors Pick Mpeppe (MPEPE) Over Dogecoin For Mobile Gaming and Casino Utility

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency world continues to expand, new and innovative tokens are stepping into the spotlight, offering more than just speculative value. Mpeppe (MPEPE) is one such token, positioning itself as a game-changer in the decentralized casino sector. With its presale in full swing and a September launch on the horizon, many Dogecoin (DOGE) holders are turning their attention to this new project. Let’s explore why Mpeppe (MPEPE) is attracting DOGE holders and how its unique features are shaking up the meme coin space.
 
Dogecoin’s Reign: Popularity vs. Utility 
Dogecoin (DOGE) has long been the darling of the memecoin universe. Born as a joke, it has evolved into a serious player, backed by high-profile endorsements from the likes of Elon Musk. However, despite its popularity, Dogeco…
articles.title: Mpeppe (MPEPE) vs Dogecoin: DOGE Holders Purchase New Casino Presale For September Launch

articles.author: aisshwaryatiwari
articles.description:
Dallas-based United Texas Bank is the latest crypto-friendly bank to face a cease and desist order from the US Federal Reserve, according to a press release issued on September 4, 2024.
 
Federal Reserve Keeping A Close Eye On Bank’s Crypto Business
 
The US Federal Reserve has identified United Texas bank as having “significant deficiencies” in its dealings with crypto-based entities, including foreign correspondent banking and digital currency customers. 
 
Specifically, the Federal Reserve has raised concerns about United Texas Bank’s risk management systems, compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) rules and regulations, and the Bank Secrecy Act (BSA). Notably, the official order has not detailed how the bank fell short of achieving the required benchmarks, violating the compliance …
articles.title: Crypto-Friendly United Texas Bank Slapped With Cease And Desist Order By The US Federal Reserve

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As September approaches, Dogecoin (DOGE) investors and whales are keen to know whether the meme cryptocurrency can break the $0.15 barrier. Dogecoin (DOGE) has been a favorite among retail investors and whales alike due to its explosive growth potential, but the competition from newer memecoins like Mpeppe (MPEPE) is heating up. Many Dogecoin (DOGE) whales are making early moves to diversify into Mpeppe (MPEPE), a rising star in the crypto world, poised to offer significant gains alongside its unique NFT and gaming integration.

articles.author: Dalmas Ngetich
articles.description:
Bitcoin is in red, struggling against the deluge of selling pressure. Even though there was hope on August 23, and the coin started the month on a firmer footing, sellers have been unyielding.
 
From the daily chart, not only is the uptrend momentum fizzling out, but price action is also domiciled at the lower range of the consolidation. The immediate support zone is between $56,500, marking July lows, and around the $58,000 mark, around the August 27 lows.
 
 
Fewer BTC Holders Are Making Money: Who Are Dominant?
 
 
 
As the coin continues edging lower, fewer investors are making profits at spot rates. According to one on-chain analyst, there has been a 25% reduction in BTC at a profit when writing. To put in the number, this equates to nearly 5 million BTC at a loss held by different en…
articles.title: Bitcoin Traders In Profit Drop By 25%, BTC Liquidity Also “Very Low”

articles.author: Samuel Edyme
articles.description:
Bitcoin’s price action in 2024 has drawn significant attention from both investors and analysts. In March, Bitcoin reached a new all-time high, and ever since, it has consistently declined. This has sparked speculation about whether this marked the final peak of the bull market.
 
While many believed the March peak was a sign of the market topping out, a recent analysis suggests that this may have only been an “interim top.”
 
 
Is Bitcoin Set For Another Surge?
 
A CryptoQuant analyst named Sachi shared insights about Bitcoin topping out in March, revealing that based on on-chain data, the market is still far from its ultimate peak.
 
The analysis highlights the importance of long-term holder activity and the use of the Binary Coin Days Destroyed (CDD) indicator to gauge market maturity.
…
articles.title: Bitcoin’s All-Time High in March: Why It Might Not Be The Final Peak Yet—CryptoQuant
